assertion: I have developed a technique to help me deal with annoying idiots.
I once dumped a boyfriend because I didn't like the way he fell down the stairs.
To celebrate her last birthday, Mary Berry and I went tenpin bowling.
I once punched him in the face because I thought he was a ghost.
After cutting his hair, I got a job on a campsite as a hairdresser.
Together, we helped free a donkey that had trapped itself in the cubicle of a seaside toilet.
I've recently got into baking and here is a cake I made just yesterday, specially for David.
